Articles.Content: Just started playing with this mod and it's very good, but how do I attach modules horizontally to the hub, please?
Build them vertically, then detach it, rotate it using WASDQE and attach it to the side.

Ah yes... that works, many thanks!

EDIT - got my first space station in orbit, very nice mod!

Edited August 13, 2012 by Bedazzled
where the f is the download button
Oh yeah. I reorganized the OP a bit to make it more friendly to additional parts packs. Just click the spoiler link where it says "Stations Pack".
So, pelf, how the probes are going?
I fixed the physics (mostly). Just need to make a decoupler for it. Then I need to do some work on the rover and probably make an aeroshell and jetpack for it, though not a skycrane.

I fixed the physics (mostly). Just need to make a decoupler for it. Then I need to do some work on the rover and probably make an aeroshell and jetpack for it, though not a skycrane.

Sounds great so far. Hope to see some images.

Hey, for some reason when I use the mod's pod as a main capsule it doesn't give me a crew and I can't right click on the hatch. It just acts like it can't hold a crew at all. This has happened for other mods too, only stock command capsules give me a crew. Please help...
Well the core modules won't get hatches. That's what airlocks are for. And it can't hold crew because I forgot to define that stuff in the .cfg. Next update will fix that stuff.

Ok, 0.4.1 is live. See the OP for download and changelog. Airlocks are now functional. Let me know if you guys want the crewed core modules back even though you can't EVA out of them. Report any bugs and be sure to delete your old parts before extracting the new ones.

Edited August 14, 2012 by Pelf

"Hatch is obstructed, can't exit" when attempting exit.

"Cannot board a full module" when attempting entry.

Edited August 14, 2012 by colmo
I think it would be really neat if you could apply the panels to animation, like we see with MJP and stuff. That would solve the drag problem, and it would look epic in general

"Hatch is obstructed, can't exit" when attempting exit.

"Cannot board a full module" when attempting entry.

I'll look into that.

Edit:

The full module problem is because I forgot to define a crew capacity in the .cfg. And I think I know what causes the other issue too.

Edited August 14, 2012 by Pelf

Just a suggestion for an extra part, the ISS has a girder structure as its backbone supporting the solar panels, while the main habitation modules are very similar to the canisters already in this mod. If we had a girder-canister component we could replicate the ISS very closely!

I prototyped an example by modding one of the existing components to try it out... looks quite good, imo! (less weight, too)

Just a suggestion for an extra part, the ISS has a girder structure as its backbone supporting the solar panels, while the main habitation modules are very similar to the canisters already in this mod. If we had a girder-canister component we could replicate the ISS very closely!

I prototyped an example by modding one of the existing components to try it out... looks quite good, imo! (less weight, too)

I plan on adding them at some point but every time I try, they don't turn out very good and I scrap them.
Nice mod! Space Station Genesis is up and running:
When will the Probe parts release? I'm so excited to send probes to outer space without risking my ships
Nice! Can you create Rover Parts? (Wheels, The Head with the Camera, and the Solar Panels to get Energy. For the wheels. I know that is a complex thing. )

I don't know when the probes will be released. In time for 0.17 though.

Regarding the rover, it will just be a single part powered by the cart mod plugin.

I don't know when the probes will be released. In time for 0.17 though.

Regarding the rover, it will just be a single part powered by the cart mod plugin.

Well well.

Great pack this, really looking forward to what you bring in the future.

Threw this together before =P
That rover is sexy, can't wait for it.
YOU KNOW i like the pobe idea i would like a rover like a spirt rover on the mun its gonna be EPIC
I'm not sure what I'll release from this. Here's a render of the non-booster parts: link
